frontmatter.author: Leïla Slimani
frontmatter.title: We are not the same as our culture; rather, our culture is what we make of it.

frontmatter.author: Leïla Slimani
frontmatter.title: The fact of living or having grown up in societies without sexual freedom makes sex a subject of constant obsession.

frontmatter.author: Leïla Slimani
frontmatter.title: If women haven't fully understood the state of inferiority in which they are kept, they will do nothing but perpetuate it.

frontmatter.author: Leïla Slimani
frontmatter.title: [S]exual rights are a part of human rights
